participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Active and health-conscious, enjoys fitness activities.
participant_1.background: Two dogs live with me. I like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. Eating is something I do when I'm bored. I have short hair. I go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Bob
participant_2.personality: Caring and community-oriented, enjoys sharing experiences and helping others.
participant_2.background: I was poor growing up. I am a retired gym teacher. I volunteer at a soup kitchen. I like watching war documentaries. Cheeseburgers are my favorite food.
